resources.string: You can add and manage your lottery tickets in here with no hyphens. You can add multiple lottery tickets. We will check their status
Current phrase. \nWe are not responsiple for provided phrase.

Please add new phrase shown on your TV screen. Phrases are saved with no accents. We are not responsible for provided passwords, nor technical issues or accidents. We are not responsible for anything at all. If any error occurs we are not responsible :)

"App was created as tool to ease overview of 'loteria Byt zdravy je vyhra' (lottery). 

Creator of this app is not responsible for lottery, nor he organized it. 

We do not collect any personal data.

Lottery winners data are scraped from MFSR web.

Lottery tickets data are saved locally in your device.

Anonymize data (ID) is generated automatically when app is started and is saved in your device.
This ID is sent with phrase submission to prevent SPAM (ID can be deleted in your app settings and will be deleted when app is uninstalized) 

You can use this app only if you are 18 years old or older. By clicking OK you declare that you are 18 years old or older.

I am not responsible for any damage, or issues with your device, TV broadcast or submited phrases.

Source code is publicly available on github
https://github.com/rado08271/vattery

MFSR Official website
https://www.mfsr.sk/

Icons are available at
https://flaticon.com


By clicking OK you agree."
Phrase cannot contain any numbers and cannot be empty
Please provide phrase, that you currently see on TV Screen ...
